sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: This function is designed for technical roles in the system that won't display anywhere, cannot delegate task or set substitute.
Differences between hidden roles and normal roles:

listitem.para: Cannot set as delegator for a task.
To marked a role as hidden role, just simply set value for property HIDE of that role. For example:
Role AXONIVY_PORTAL_ADMIN is marked as a hidden role by default.
